about_the_game:
Collection of DreadOut: The Untolds webcomic, tells several untold fragments of Linda's journey on the event of DreadOut 1.
This DLC contains 12 episodes on Hi-res JPG format.
We will continue to update the episodes, in our future updates
Currently only available on English and Indonesia language, we also planned to add several language support later.
Enjoy! :)

content_descriptors.notes: Intense horror, fear themes, and some topics are related to mature suggestive themes, gore, violence, and use of tobacco.
